attributes.action: Not undermine the House of Commons and make Secretaries of State in the House of Lords
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: Secretaries of State should be held accountable in the House of Commons and not the Lords, this is undermining democracy when senior ministers are not held to account by the elected chamber.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
